attributes.action: Make compulsory to eat Pie & Mash at least once a week.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The pies sold at all the shops are baked fresh on the day. The pastry is hand made and rolled and then filled with fresh beef minced on site, they only use prime cuts of beef and nothing else. A small amount of gravy is added to each pie before the top layer of pastry is added. The pies are then cooked in traditional stone ovens in large trays.

They hand make and bake all of their pies to ensure you of the best quality at all times.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
